title: M.I.A
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/04/MIA2.jpg)](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/04/MIA2.jpg)

M.I.A’s latest single ‘Born Free’ is a stomper of a punk rock anthem, raucous and rebellious this is definitely a song you’ll be hearing a lot of this summer. No details of the song have been posted on M.I.A’s website, but with her so far untitled new album just round the corner we expect new announcements soon. But for now listen to the tune and fantasise about how incredible the new album with be.

[Download Born Free](http://www.mediafire.com/?og2amoomnz2)
